pullRequest.title: TSK-998: Removing linting errors with minor code changes
pullRequest.bodyText: Mainly renaming and restructuring for- to forEach-loops.

nodes.bodyText: I changed the name because the input parameter of a method must not be changed.
I must not change this since I adapted the eslint-rules - but I like this solution better.

I'm not sure about this, but the linter said, it's already defined in node_modules and it cannot be overwritten.
And I could delete it without getting in troubles - so I removed it.

commit.message:
TSK-998: Removing linting errors with minor code changes

Mainly renaming and restructuring to forEach-loops.
